tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (S (S (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ huge) (NN word)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN life)))) (ADVP (RB right) (RB now)))) (: ...) (S (VP (VBG Trying) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB downsize) (PP (IN on))))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [word/NN cop>is/VBZ det>a/DT amod>huge/JJ nmod:in>[life/NN case>in/IN nmod:poss>my/PRP$] advmod>[now/RB advmod>right/RB] punct>.../: parataxis>[Trying/VBG xcomp>[downsize/VB mark>to/TO nmod>on/IN]]]
